attributes.background: As GCSEs are much harder now it is more likely that students will be stressed which affects their mental health and more likely for them to not pass which will not only jeopardise  their future but will cause the economy of the uk to dwindle because they will not be employed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the content of exams is the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

GCSEs, AS levels and A levels are regulated by Ofqual. You can find out more about its work here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/regulating-gcses-as-and-a-levels-guide-for-schools-and-colleges
